bioconda.name: bioconductor-baalchip
bioconda.summary: BaalChIP: Bayesian analysis of allele-specific transcription factor binding in cancer genomes

biotools.summary: This package offers functions to process multiple ChIP-seq BAM files and detect allele-specific events. Computes allele counts at individual variants (SNPs/SNVs), implements extensive QC steps to remove problematic variants, and utilizes a bayesian framework to identify statistically significant allele-specific events. It is able to account for copy number differences between the two alleles, a known phenotypical feature of cancer samples.
